mapper.select: SELECT L.*, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUB_YEAR FROM tbl_lend L JOIN tbl_book B ON L.ISBN= B.ISBN WHERE L.LEND_SEQ = #{lendSeq}
SELECT L.*, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUB_YEAR FROM tbl_lend L JOIN tbl_book B ON L.ISBN= B.ISBN WHERE L.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT L.*, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUB_YEAR FROM tbl_lend L JOIN tbl_book B ON L.ISBN= B.ISBN WHERE L.ISBN = #{isbn}
SELECT L.*, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUB_YEAR FROM tbl_lend L JOIN tbl_book B ON L.ISBN= B.ISBN WHERE NOW() > DUE_DATE;
SELECT L.*, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUB_YEAR FROM tbl_lend L JOIN tbl_book B ON L.ISBN= B.ISBN
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_lend SET DUE_DATE = DATE_ADD(DUE_DATE, INTERVAL 5 DAY), EXTENSION_CNT= EXTENSION_CNT+1 WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
